title: Gerry (footballer)
text:
José Oliveira de Souza (born March 19, <a href="1978">1978</a>), known in Brazil as Gerry, is a Brazilian former <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">striker</a> who last played for <a href="Esp%C3%ADrito%20Santo%20Sociedade%20Esportiva">Espírito Santo Sociedade Esportiva</a>.
Until November 2010, Oliveira played for <a href="Alianza%20F.C.">Alianza</a>. However, he ended his stint at the club and returned to his native Brazil to be with his pregnant wife. He did not rule out the possibility of returning to Alianza in the future.
